name: Mire (Cardboard Box Studio)
description:
Mire is an open world 2d shooter where you play as a fly. Purge the swamp of your predators as you take on monstrous creatures in difficult boss battles.

Includes:
-4 boss battles
-A bunch of overworld creatures
-A beautiful open world to explore
-4 game modes, ranging from easy to torment
-Save game functionality
